scripts.build: cd app/frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-frontend && npm run build  && npm run install-backend
scripts.start-application-back-end: cd app/backend && npm run start-db && npm run dev
scripts.start: npm run install-backend && npm run start-db && npm run install-frontend && npm run start-application-back-end && npm run start-application-front-end
